items.title: Iron Helm Review
items.description: Iron Helm is a fantastic solo dungeon crawler in a fairly small package.

items.title: My Top Solo Ranking of Board Games
items.description: My solo ranking of all games I've played as of May 27th 2023

items.title: My Solo Ranking of Button Shy Games
items.description: My solo ranking of their games as of May 9th 2023

items.title: Sprawlopolis + Expansions Review (Solo Mode)
items.description: Sprawlopolis is a fantastic city builder in solo with high replayability.

items.title: Fishing Lessons Review
items.description: Fishing Lessons is a satisfying programming game that has limited replayability.

items.title: SpaceShipped Review
items.description: SpaceShipped is a great space merchant adventure that is let down by extreme randomness.

items.title: When to Buy New Games?
items.description: As someone new to the hobby I've found it difficult to decide when to buy new games.

items.title: Death Valley + Expansion Review (Solo Mode)
items.description: Death Valley provides great tableau building in a small package but has limited replayability.
